question: What is the name of India’s first e-commerce housing portal, launched by National Real Estate Development Council?
explanation:
The National Real Estate Development Council recently announced the launch of India’s first e-commerce housing portal called ‘HousingForAll.Com’. The portal was launched by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Affairs Ministry (MoHUA), Durga Shanker Mishra.
The e-Commerce portal, with nearly 1,000 listed properties, is to host a 45-day nationwide online home-buying campaign for ready-to-move-in homes. Hardeep Puri, Minister of State (IC), MoHUA announced the initiative of e-commerce housing portal, during the first National RERA Conclave held in Lucknow, in November 2019.
